topic.title: Reverting lookup configuration draft to latest published state

body.p: If there is a need to revert draft lookup tables back to the state of last publishing, you can do that by running CG Configuration Node in revert mode. Reverting copies the data from the published lookup tables back to the draft lookup tables and any changes made to the draft tables are discarded.
1. In Data Refinery UI, open the Configuration stream.
2. Select the CG Configuration Node named REVERT_CONFIGURATION.
3. Click Execute now, then verify with Execute.
CG Configuration Node has now been run in revert mode, and the configuration in draft lookup tables has been reverted to the published configuration in the database.
